channel.title: Auth on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Auth on SoftLayer API

item.title: Get IPMI info for BMS
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) object_mask = 'mask[networkManagementIpAddress,remoteManagementAccounts[username,password],id,fullyQualifiedDomainName]' item = client['SoftLayer_Account'] getIPMI = item.object_mask(object_mask).getHardware pp getIPMI

item.title: Get IPMI info for Bare Metal Server
item.description: <?php require_once './vendor/autoload.php'; $apiUsername = getenv('SOFTLAYER_USERNAME'); $apiKey = getenv('SOFTLAYER_API_KEY'); $server_id = 882187; try { $client = \SoftLayer\SoapClient::getClient('SoftLayer_Account', $server_id, $apiUsername, $apiKey); $objectMask = new \SoftLayer\Common\ObjectMask(); $objectMask->networkManagementIpAddress; $objectMask->remoteManagementAccounts->username; $objectMask->remoteManagementAccounts->password; $objectMask->id; $objectMask->fullyQualifiedDomainName; $client->setObjectMask($objectMask); $response = $client->getHardware($objectMask); print_r($response); } catch(Exception $e) { echo 'Cannot compute. Error is: ' . $e->getMessage(); } ?>

item.title: Get IPMI info for BMS
item.description: import SoftLayer from pprint import pprint as pp client = SoftLayer.Client() mask = """mask[networkManagementIpAddress,remoteManagementAccounts[username,password],id,fullyQualifiedDomainName]""" result = client['SoftLayer_Account'].getHardware(mask=mask) pp(result)
